attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The animal right lessons should be cumpulsory in every primary and secondary school in Uk because to devolop morality towards innocent animals where animals are abused cruelly in fur industries, animal labouratory, and in farms. Animal violance is very serious issue that facing now. It should be eliminated through out the britail by giving moral education in schools by adopting animal rights lessons

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
